alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 11:50AM CST until January 13 at 12:45PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Kentucky... Illinois...Missouri... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo. .Heavy rain from last weekend has contributed to rises on the Ohio River drainage basin this week with minor flooding anticipated. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam, Cairo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 35.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 39.0 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
